languages.text: "Нет жалости к тем, кто сослан на мир-тюрьму для искупления, а сам чинит беспорядки".
"Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."
languages.original_text: "Нет жалости к тем, кто сослан на мир-тюрьму для искупления, а сам чинит беспорядки".

traits.locale_text: "There is no pity for those who have beet exiled to the Penal World for atonement, and yet keep creating unrest around themselves."
"There is no pity for those who have beet exiled to the Penal World for atonement, and yet keep creating unrest around themselves."
"Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."
"Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."
"Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."
"Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

languages.text: “那些被流放到刑罚世界的人不值得同情。他们为了赎罪而做着苦力，可即便如此，他们依然不断在周围散播混乱。”
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: “那些被流放到刑罚世界的人不值得同情。他们为了赎罪而做着苦力，可即便如此，他们依然不断在周围散播混乱。”
“我从不同情那些被流放到刑罚世界的人。他们为了赎罪而做着苦力，可即便如此，他们依然不断在周围散播混乱。”

languages.text: «No tengo piedad para quienes han sido desterrados a un mundo penal para su expiación y, aun así, siguen creando problemas».
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo piedad para quienes han sido desterrados a un mundo penal para su expiación y, aun así, siguen creando problemas».

languages.text: 「贖罪のために流刑惑星に追放された人々を憐れむことはしない、奴らは未だに自分たちの周りに混乱を引き起し続けているんだ」
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: 「アトーンメントのために流刑惑星に追放された人々を憐れむことはしない、奴らは未だに自分たちの周りに混乱を引き起し続けているんだ」
「アトーンメントのために流刑惑星に追放された人々を憐れむことはしない、奴らは未だに自分たちの周りに混乱を引き起し続けているんだ」

languages.text: « Ceux qui ont été condamnés à l'exil sur un monde pénal et qui continuent à semer la pagaille autour d'eux ne méritent aucune pitié. »
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui ont été condamnés à l'exil sur un monde pénal et qui continuent à semer la pagaille autour d'eux ne méritent aucune pitié. »

languages.text: "Wer zur Buße auf eine Strafwelt verbannt wird und weiter für Chaos sorgt, verdient keine Gnade."
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: "Wer zur Buße auf eine Strafwelt verbannt wird und weiter für Chaos sorgt, verdient keine Gnade."
"Ich habe kein Mitleid mit jenen, die auf eine Strafwelt verbannt wurden, um Buße zu tun, dann aber weiter nur Chaos säen."

languages.text: "Kefaret için ceza dünyasına sürülmelerine rağmen düzeni bozanlar, acınmayı hak etmez."
languages.original_text: "Those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement and yet continue to sow disorder deserve no pity."

traits.locale_text: "Kefaret için ceza dünyasına sürülmelerine rağmen düzeni bozanlar, acınmayı hak etmez."
